Champion Select[]

Pick
  • ▶️   Sound Effect
  • ▶️   "A clever fox is never caught."
Ban
  • ▶️   "You don't have to be afraid of me."
  • Classic
  • Star Guardian
  • Spirit Blossom
  • Announcer

Original
Popstar
Coven
Each of these skins may feature: a voiceover filter; additional quotes and/or interactions. In all other cases, skins use the base skin's audio or version of the audio. Some voicelines may also be disabled while using alternate skins.

Taunt[]

Ahri wags her finger, then unfurls her tails threateningly.
  • ▶️   ▶️   "I see all that you desire. Rawr!"
  • ▶️   "You can try to reach my level."
Taunt Response
  • ▶️   ▶️   "I've seen your most embarrassing moments, you know."

Joke[]

Ahri reclines on her tails and tosses her orb in the air.
  • ▶️   ▶️   Ahri giggles and grunts playfully.
  • ▶️   "My tails are my good-luck charm."
Joke Response
  • ▶️   ▶️   "Oh, you were trying to be funny? Cute."

Laugh[]

  • ▶️   ▶️   Ahri laughs.

Dance[]

  • ▶️   Ahri plays a segment of her theme.

Sound Effects[]

  • ▶️   Spirit Blossom Ahri Accompanying SFX
  • ▶️   Spirit Blossom Ahri Accompanying SFX

The Ahri Announcer pack was a limited time announcer which was featured during the August 2017 event, Star Guardian: New Horizon. It featured Star Guardian Ahri as a replacement announcer on all PvP maps, and as the announcer of the limited time gamemode, Invasion.

  • General
  • Invasion

References[]

Trivia[]

Ahri, the Nine-Tailed Fox
  • As part of Ahri's 2023 ASU, her voiceover was updated to depict her after the events of Ruined King.
  • ▶️  "I wander, but I'm not lost." references ▶️   "A wanderer isn't always lost." and ▶️   "Not all who wander are lost."
  • ▶️  "We are what our natures demand. Right, Pyke?" is a callback to a conversation between Ahri and Pyke in Ruined King.
Popstar Ahri
  • Some of this skin's unique quotes reference various K-Pop songs.
    • K/DA
      • ▶️   "♫ 'Stuck in a place, between the space, of heart and mind.' ♫ Ooh, I like that!" references I'LL SHOW YOU.
      • ▶️   "You can try to reach my level." references POP/STARS.
    • Girls' Generation
      • ▶️   "Need an introduction? Well here comes trouble!" references I Got a Boy.
      • ▶️   "Run, devil, run!" references the eponymous song.
      • ▶️   "What's your wish?" references Tell Me Your Wish (Genie).
    • TWICE
      • ▶️   "You've stolen my heart!" references The Feels.
      • ▶️   "The brighter the spotlight, the darker the shadow." references I Can't Stop Me.
    • BTS
      • ▶️   "I'm not looking for permission to dance!" references Permission to Dance.
      • ▶️   "If you can't fly, then run." references Not Today.
      • ▶️   "When the cheers die down, will my fans still be by my side?" references Friends.
      • ▶️   "I won't be trapped in someone else's dream." references N.O.
    • BIGBANG
      • ▶️   "Bang bang bang!" references the eponymous song.
    • MAMAMOO
      • ▶️   "Let's go, go, baby! references gogobebe.
    • ITZY
      • ▶️   "My best is yet to come." references Sneakers.
    • Red Velvet
      • ▶️   "Hear my song and dance in the moonlight!" references Feel my rhythm.
    • Taeyang
      • ▶️   "Only look at me." references the eponymous song.
Popstar Ahri (old)
  • Before Ahri's ASU, the skin having its own voiceover was a unique feature of the Korean localization (voiced by Lee Yong-shin).
  • The voicelines were as follows:
    • "비켜! 이 구역의 스타는 나야." ("Out of the way! I'm the star here.")
    • "어머~ 너 코디가 안티다!" ("Oh my~ Cody is a hater!")
    • "저한테 푹 빠지셨군요?" ("Are you in love with me?")
    • "내 무대에서 내려가." ("Get off my stage.")
    • "이번주 차트 1위도 내 차지야!" ("I'm the one on the top charts!")
    • "안티 따위 겁나지 않아." ("I'm not afraid of haters.")
    • "사인을 받고 싶으면 줄부터 서시라구요. 네?" ("If you want an autograph, get in line. Okay?")
    • "저랑 놀려면 월드 스타 정도는 돼야 하지 않겠어요?" ("You don't have to be a pop star to play with me, right?")
    • "예능으로 해줄까... 아니면, 다큐로 해줄까?" ("Shall we do it as a variety show... or should we do it as a documentary?")
    • "가까이 와요~" ("Come closer~")
    • "노래로... 녹여볼까요?" ("Shall we melt it with a song?")
    • "안녕~ 여러분의 팝스타 아리예요!" ("Hello~ I'm Ahri, your pop star!")
    • "다음 스케줄은 어디죠?" ("What's your schedule?")
    • "절... 기다리셨나요?" ("Did you... wait just for me?")
    • "근데... 이름이 뭐예요, 자기?" ("So... what's your name, honey?")
    • "함께~ 불러볼까요~" ("Let's sing together~")
    • "내가 갈게요. 느낌 아니까." ("I'll go first. I feel it!")
    • "립싱크도 안 했는데..." ("I didn't even lip sync...")
    • "화장도 잘 먹었는데..." ("I had a good make-up...")
    • "내 팬들이... 가만 두지 않을 거야..." ("My fans... won't let them go...")
    • "리허설 땐 좋았는데..." ("It was good during rehearsal...")
Star Guardian Ahri
  • ▶️  "I fight for love, justice and beauty!... But mostly beauty." is similar to Sailor Venus introduction speech.
  • ▶️  "That was amaze-balls!" references Perez Hilton's distinctive slang.
  • ▶️  "I'm going to kill you. That's what the fox says." is a reference to the 2014 song “The Fox (What Does the Fox Say?)” by Ylvis.
  • ▶️  "(Giggle) Just a fox on the run!" could be a reference to the song Fox on the run by Sweet (1975).
    • Her quotes ▶️  "I can't help it if I'm a natural leader." and ▶️  "I can't help it if I woke up like this." are references to Mean Girls too. The last one also refers to the 2013 song “Flawless” by Beyoncé.
  • Her quote when attacking Warwick (▶️  "Stop trying to make fetch happen.") is a reference to the 2004 comedy film Mean Girls.
  • The first sentence of the quote ▶️  "Love will tear us apart... if the creatures from an alternate dimension don't first." is a reference to the 1980 song “Love Will Tear Us Apart” by Joy Division.
  • ▶️  "Byeee!" sounds much like Alaska Thunderfuck's signature goodbye.
  • Her quote ▶️  "The darkest night makes for the brightest stars." is similar to ▶️   "The darker the night, the brighter the stars.".
Spirit Blossom Ahri
  • Her interactions with Spirit Blossom Yasuo reference/resemble quotes from Yasuo's voiceover.
    • ▶️  "Hello, Yasuo. Did you ever figure out a leaf's purpose?" references ▶️   "Is a leaf's only purpose to fall?"
    • ▶️   ▶️   "Hasagi!"
    • ▶️  "Death is like the wind..." references ▶️   "Death is like the wind - always by my side."
  • ▶️  "Poor unfortunate souls!" resembles ▶️   "Poor lost souls."
  • ▶️  " Playtime's just beginning!" references Ahri's pre-ASU line ▶️   "Playtime's over."
